Trade/Device Name(s): iHealth BG5 Wireless Smart Gluco-Monitoring System
iHealth BG5L Wireless Smart Gluco-Monitoring System
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): iHealth BG5 Wireless Smart Gluco-Monitoring System
iHealth BG5L Wireless Smart Gluco-Monitoring System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for iHealth BG5 and BG5L wireless smart gluco-monitoring systems for self-testing blood glucose using electrochemical biosensor technology with Bluetooth connectivity to iOS devices.
Indications for Use Summary: Quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from various body sites for self-testing by people with diabetes at home to monitor diabetes control; not for diagnosis, screening, or neonatal use.
